data.name: Kingdom Come: Deliverance – Treasures of The Past
data.detailed_description:
Special Offer

https://store.steampowered.com/app/970070/Fechtbuch_The_Real_Swordfighting_behind_Kingdom_Come/


About the Game

Treasures of the Past DLC contains

  • Treasure maps of the lords banished by King Sigismund of Hungary, leading to the hidden treasures of those patriots, bandits and schemers.
  • The mythical armor of the Warhorse tribe. Shrouded in mystery - it is said that the original wearer purged all the dragons from the Kingdom of Bohemia.
data.about_the_game:
Treasures of the Past DLC contains

  • Treasure maps of the lords banished by King Sigismund of Hungary, leading to the hidden treasures of those patriots, bandits and schemers.
  • The mythical armor of the Warhorse tribe. Shrouded in mystery - it is said that the original wearer purged all the dragons from the Kingdom of Bohemia.
data.short_description: Treasures of the Past DLC contains treasure maps of the lords banished by King Sigismund of Hungary and the mythical armor of the Warhorse tribe.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Polish, Russian, Italian, Simplified Chinese, Turkish
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: OS 64-bit Windows 7 or 64-bit Windows 8 (8.1) or Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel CPU Core i5-2500K 3.3GHz, AMD CPU Phenom II X4 940
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 660, AMD GPU Radeon HD 7870
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated
  • Additional Notes: Specification are for the main game, the DLC is very small.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: OS 64-bit Windows 7 or 64-bit Windows 8 (8.1) or Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel CPU Core i7 3770 3,4 GHz, AMD CPU AMD FX-8350 4 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 1060, AMD GPU Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Creative SOUND BLASTER Zx
  • Additional Notes: Specification are for the main game, the DLC is very small.
